800:523: ekārtham advayam iti yad advayadharmaṃ tad ekārtham ubhayapa-
800:532: nadīnām udakaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tat samudre samatvaṃ yāti|

800:549: sarvataḥ smṛtimāl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati|| iti|

800:574: bhavaḥ| atha tāmre'vyayatvena saṃsthitas tadā siddharaseṇāpy apanetuṃ na śakyate|

800:577: tāmreṇa sahotpanno'py ayaṃ kāliko rasayogād naśyati na paścād na pūrvaṃ na tadrahita iti|

800:584: yauvane surate prāptā svayam eva vetti|
800:591: yadi teṣāṃ virāgasaṃbhūtir na bhavati tadā nānyaprakāreṇa
800:598: ādhāre cyutim āpanna ādheyasya virāgatā bhavati|

800:602: akṣarodbhavakāyasya cittasyorṇācakramadhyagatasyālikālyor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samāyogo mīlanaṃ madhyamāpravāhitvaṃ hūṃkārādyaṃ ca madhyamāpravāhanibandhanaṃ neṣyate|
